snippet: To the Editor:    When Federal judges strike down term limits for elected officials passed by the people (''California State Term Limits Overturned by Federal Judge,'' news article, April 24), it is time for the people to pass term limits for Fede...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: When Federal judges strike down term limits for elected officials passed by the people (''California State Term Limits Overturned by Federal Judge,'' news article, April 24), it is time for the people to pass term limits for Federal judges. JAMES OSTROWSKI Buffalo, April 26, 1997
abstract: James Ostrowski letter comments on April 24 article on decision by Federal judge overturning term limits for elected officials in California (S)
